actions.description: The warlord makes two Greatsword or Short bow attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.
actions.name: Greatsword

actions.description: 7 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Shortbow

actions.description: The warlord targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. if the target can see and hear the warlord, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.
actions.name: Command Ally

actions.description: The warlord makes one Greatsword or Shortbow attack.
actions.name: Weapon Attack

actions.description: The warlord targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear it, the target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of warlord's next turn.
actions.name: Frighten Foe (Costs 2 Actions)

specialTraits.description: The warlord can reroll a saving throw it fails. It must use the new roll.
specialTraits.name: Indomitable (3/Day)

specialTraits.description: The warlord regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has fewer than half its hit points but at least 1 hit point.
specialTraits.name: Survivor
